doc: Service class for all the business methods related to the service model class in the PLMS system

methods.name: createService
updateService
getServiceByServiceName
methods.doc:
Returns the service information for the service with the given
 name.

 Throws a PLMSException if there is no service with the
 given name.

 @param serviceName
            Name of an existing service (primary key)
 @return service information for the service

methods.name: deleteServiceByServiceName
methods.doc:
Deletes the service with the given serviceName.

 Throws a PLMSException if there is no service with the
 given name.

 @param serviceName
            Name of an existing service (primary key)

methods.name: getAllServices
methods.doc:
Returns the service information for all services.

 @return List of all services
